greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n is the expansion of x^n in terms of (x+k)!/x! for decreasing k.
example: The fourth row corresponds to the expansion
program: (Maxima) f1(p, n) := if n = 0 then [p] else [coeff(p, x ^ n), f1(p - expand(product(x + i, i, 1, n) * coeff(p, x^ n)), n - 1)$
results.author: _Douglas Boffey_, Jun 18 2012
